roleset.name: grow up, age; the inchoative event as it takes place
cause to mature

example.name: maturity-n: args 1 and 3
example.text: The relationship between a parent and child is necessary to the maturity of the child into a healthy and well-adjusted adult.
example.arg: into a healthy and well-adjusted adult

roleset.note: MATURATE-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel additions to VN, PB and sense groupings. VN entry 26.2. Framed by Claire (from maturate.01-v) MATURITY-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on . Framed by Katie. (from maturation.01-n)
